scripts.build:analyze: npm run build --stats-json && npx --yes webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/storefrontapp/stats.json
scripts.build: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,$SPA_ENV ng build storefrontapp --configuration production
scripts.build:asm: npm --prefix feature-libs/asm run build:schematics && ng build asm --configuration production
scripts.build:user: npm --prefix feature-libs/user run build:schematics && ng build user --configuration production
scripts.build:cart: npm --prefix feature-libs/cart run build:schematics && ng build cart --configuration production
scripts.build:cdc: npm --prefix integration-libs/cdc run build:schematics && ng build cdc --configuration production
scripts.build:cds: npm --prefix integration-libs/cds run build:schematics && ng build cds --configuration production
scripts.build:checkout: npm --prefix feature-libs/checkout run build:schematics && ng build checkout --configuration production
scripts.build:customer-ticketing: npm --prefix feature-libs/customer-ticketing run build:schematics && ng build customer-ticketing --configuration production
scripts.build:digital-payments: npm --prefix integration-libs/digital-payments run build:schematics && ng build digital-payments --configuration production
scripts.build:epd-visualization: npm --prefix integration-libs/epd-visualization run build:schematics && ng build epd-visualization --configuration production
scripts.build:order: npm --prefix feature-libs/order run build:schematics && ng build order --configuration production
scripts.build:libs: ng build core --configuration production && ng build storefrontlib --configuration production && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:schematics npm:build:user && npm run build:cart && npm run build:order && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:checkout npm:build:asm npm:build:tracking npm:build:customer-ticketing && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:organization npm:build:product npm:build:product-configurator npm:build:storefinder && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:build:smartedit npm:build:qualtrics npm:build:assets npm:build:cds npm:build:cdc npm:build:digital-payments npm:build:epd-visualization npm:build:s4om npm:build:pickup-in-store && npm run build:setup
scripts.build:organization: npm --prefix feature-libs/organization run build:schematics && ng build organization --configuration production
scripts.build:pickup-in-store: npm --prefix feature-libs/pickup-in-store run build:schematics && ng build pickup-in-store --configuration production
scripts.build:product: npm --prefix feature-libs/product run build:schematics && ng build product --configuration production
scripts.build:product-configurator: npm --prefix feature-libs/product-configurator run build:schematics && ng build product-configurator --configuration production
scripts.build:s4om: npm --prefix integration-libs/s4om run build:schematics && ng build s4om --configuration production
scripts.build:qualtrics: npm --prefix feature-libs/qualtrics run build:schematics && ng build qualtrics --configuration production
scripts.build:storefinder: npm --prefix feature-libs/storefinder run build:schematics && ng build storefinder --configuration production
scripts.build:smartedit: npm --prefix feature-libs/smartedit run build:schematics && ng build smartedit --configuration production
scripts.build:tracking: npm --prefix feature-libs/tracking run build:schematics && ng build tracking --configuration production
scripts.generate:publish:docs: npm run generate:docs && npm run publish:docs
scripts.test:libs: concurrently "ng test core --code-coverage" "ng test storefrontlib --code-coverage" "ng test cart --code-coverage" "ng test organization --code-coverage" "ng test storefinder --code-coverage" "ng test smartedit --code-coverage" "ng test asm --code-coverage" "ng test qualtrics --code-coverage" "ng test product --code-coverage" "ng test product-configurator --code-coverage" "ng test customer-ticketing --code-coverage" "ng test cdc --code-coverage" "ng test setup --code-coverage" "ng test checkout --code-coverage" "ng test order --code-coverage" "ng test digital-payments --code-coverage" "ng test epd-visualization --code-coverage" "ng test pickup-in-store --code-coverage"
scripts.dev:ssr: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,$SPA_ENV cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 ng run storefrontapp:serve-ssr
scripts.prerender:dev: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,$SPA_ENV cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 ng run storefrontapp:prerender --routes-file projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
scripts.prerender:cds: env-cmd --no-override -e cds ng run storefrontapp:prerender --routes-file projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
scripts.dev:cds:ssr: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,b2c,cds cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 ng run storefrontapp:serve-ssr
scripts.prerender:cds:dev: env-cmd --no-override -e dev,cds cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 ng run storefrontapp:prerender --routes-file projects/storefrontapp/prerender.txt
